item.title: Visual Intelligence Powering Next-Generation Robotics
item.description: Machine vision is evolving from simple inspection to a core enabler of robotic intelligence, providing spatial awareness and real-time measurement for flexible, high-mix manufacturing.

item.title: All-in-One SLAM LiDAR, RTK and 360° Imagery Scanner Launched
item.description: Emesent launched the GX1, an integrated SLAM and RTK scanner achieving 5-10mm global accuracy for topographic surveying and construction.

item.title: Driving Automotive Quality with Automation
item.description: Ajin Industrial implemented Creaform's CUBE-R automated 3D scanning cell to replace manual fixtures, achieving higher repeatability and speed for automotive body-in-white inspection.

item.title: LK Metrology CT System
item.description: LK Metrology introduced the COREX 250, a cost-effective industrial CT system designed specifically for shop floor production environments rather than labs.

item.title: CAPPS 2026 Powers Data-Driven CNC Manufacturing
item.description: Applied Automation Technologies released CAPPS 2026, advancing on-machine metrology with improved laser scanning integration and automated process control for CNC manufacturing.

item.title: $124M Investment Funds Machina Labs’ First Large-Scale Intelligent Factory
item.description: Machina Labs secured $124M Series C funding to build a large-scale intelligent factory using robotic manufacturing cells, signaling major growth in software-defined production infrastructure.

item.title: Orbbec and Robbyant Set a New Benchmark in Robotic Depth Perception
item.description: Orbbec partners with Robbyant to optimize spatial perception models for its Gemini 330 stereo depth cameras, enhancing reliability for commercial robotic vision applications.
